org.safs.control

Class Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.safs.control.Control
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ControlStep

    public abstract class Control
extends java.lang.Object
    Description : Control, commands used to control an engine by sending step commands
    Since:
    NOV 24, 2003
    NOV 24, 2003 (DBauman) Original Release, cut from ControlStep, which extends us

    • Method Detail

      • setSAFSTestRecordData

        public void setSAFSTestRecordData()
                           throws SAFSException
        setSAFSTestRecordData

        DESCRIPTION: Populates the shared "SAFS/Hook/" TestRecordData in SAFSVARS This is used to pass info TO and FROM other tools (like RobotJ).

        Throws:
        SAFSException - Throws exception if STAF is not installed.
        Author: Doug Bauman
        Date: JUN 19, 2003
        History:

        JUN 19, 2003 Original Release
        JUN 26, 2003 dbauman: ported to java
        NOV 24, 2003 dbauman: copyied from RobotJHook

      • getSAFSTestRecordData

        public void getSAFSTestRecordData()
                           throws SAFSException
        getSAFSTestRecordData

        DESCRIPTION: Populates the data structure FROM shared "SAFS/Hook/" TestRecordData in SAFSVARS. This is used to pass info TO and FROM other tools (like RobotJ).

        Throws:
        SAFSException - Throws "Error in loading DLL" if STAF is not installed.
        Orig Author: Carl Nagle
        Orig Date: JUN 19, 2003
        History:

        JUN 19, 2003 Original Release
        JUN 26, 2003 dbauman: ported to java
        NOV 24, 2003 dbauman: copyied from RobotJHook

      • callSAFSJHook

        public void callSAFSJHook()
                   throws SAFSException
        callSAFSJHook

        DESCRIPTION: Perform the full event-driven exchange for Classic to invoke a driver to process a test input record.

        Throws:
        SAFSException - if STAF is not installed.
        Orig Author: Doug Bauman
        Orig Date: NOV 24, 2003
        History:

        NOV 24, 2003 dbauman: copyied from RobotJHook

      • prepTestRecordData

        public TestRecordData prepTestRecordData(long ln)

        Purpose: prepare the test record data
        Returns:
        TestRecordData

      • fireJRequest

        public void fireJRequest(java.lang.String request)
                  throws SAFSException

        Purpose: fireJRequest, execute a test steps. First sets the status code to SCRIPT_NOT_EXECUTED and the inputRecord to the request, then calls 'callSAFSJHook'
        Parameters:
        request, - one test step
        Throws:
        SAFSException

      • testJHook

        public void testJHook(java.util.Collection c,
             java.lang.String filename)
               throws SAFSException

        Purpose: testJHook, execute a collection of test steps
        Parameters:
        filename, - String
        c, - Collection of Test Steps
        Throws:
        SAFSException
